tool.name: SNP Extraction
tool.description: Takes a set of SNPs or regions and returns a new ped/map with only those specified
tool.command: #if ($snp_or_region.display_snp_or_region == "snps"): echo $snp_or_region.snplist | tr -s "__cr____cn__" "\n" > snplist.txt ; #else echo $snp_or_region.region | tr -s "__cr____cn__" "\n" > region.txt ; #end if plink --noweb --file "$input_lped.extra_files_path/$input_lped.metadata.base_name" #if ($snp_or_region.display_snp_or_region == "snps"): --extract snplist.txt #else --extract region.txt --range #end if --recode --out $input_lped.metadata.base_name $no_sex ; python ${__root_dir__}/tool-data/shared/composite_datatypes/create_composite_rgenetics.py 'lped' $output_lped $input_lped.metadata.base_name $output_lped.extra_files_path

param.name: input_lped
param.label: Lped Input
param.help: Contains your map and ped file.

param.name: display_snp_or_region
param.label: Extract by series of SNPs or regions

param.name: snplist
param.label: SNPs to extract
param.help: Please enter each SNP rs#, one per line.

param.name: region
param.label: Region to extract
param.help: Please enter a series of ranges you wish to extract in format: chr startPos endPos name_of_range. E.g. 2 30000000 35000000 R1 with one range per line

param.name: no_sex
param.label: Allow no-sex samples to be included
